Name: Firejail
Description: Firejail is a SUID program that reduces the risk of security breaches by restricting the running environment of untrusted applications.
HTU: Install Firejail, run applications with Firejail to isolate them from the rest of the system.

Name: Qubes OS
Description: Qubes OS is a security-focused operating system that uses virtualization to create isolated compartments called qubes.
HTU: Install Qubes OS, create and manage qubes, and run applications in isolated qubes.

Name: Gvisor
Description: Gvisor is a user-space kernel, written in Go, that provides an additional layer of isolation between running applications and the host kernel.
HTU: Install Gvisor, configure it to run containers, and isolate applications from the host system.

Name: Shadow Daemon
Description: Shadow Daemon is a collection of tools to detect, record, and prevent web attacks by isolating and analyzing web application traffic.
HTU: Install Shadow Daemon, configure it with your web server, and monitor web traffic for malicious activities.

Name: Snappy
Description: Snappy is a software deployment and package management system that uses containerization to isolate applications from the system.
HTU: Install Snappy, package applications as snaps, and run them in isolated environments.
